type: TS LF Trading Bot Warning - Skipping Cancel Order Event

definition.text: For some reason we could not check the order status at the exchange, so we can not know if we need to cancel it. In order to avoid with inconsistent information at the accounting level we did not evaluate the conditions of the Cancel Order Event.

paragraphs.text: This is normal behaviour you should not worry about. This warning is created in order to let you know that this happened and help you track the details of each trade.
The following are the values of variables at the time this warning was created. They might be useful for you to understand what exactly happened.
To learn more about this topic, please read the following page:
